website_summaries.verdict: Protect your outdoor, mounted TV from the elements with a cover that stands up to seasons of wear.
pros: Included microfiber cloth to dust and polish screen without chemicals
cons: Not intended to withstand direct rain or water
Difficult to install around a wall bracket
Cover can not stay on and folded up to watch TV

customer_reviews.title: Good quality, refer to the measurement guide
customer_reviews.text: Easy to put on and remove. The material feels durable and seems like it will withstand quite a bit of weather. My favorite part is that I can velcro the bottom closed as well. Make sure to refer to the measurement guide posted by the manufacturer, as the cover sizes refer to the width of the TV, not the diagonal measurement. A lot of reviews mention that their cover is oversized, which will happen if you don't double-check the guide! I have a 55" TV and purchased the 46"-48" cover, which fits perfectly.
customer_reviews.author: Rebekah Cross

customer_reviews.title: It protects from rain... even in an intense thunderstorm
customer_reviews.text: We just had our TV installed outside and had a huge thunderstorm. 2 inches of rain. The cover came in that morning so it was on the television set and it was protected completely from the rain. The outside of the cover was very wet but the TV was safe.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Well made, difficult to really seal up with a flush tilt mount
customer_reviews.text: I bought the 50" one which was supposed to fit my 55" tv but it is pretty large. It goes on easy but Its impossible with a two post tilt mount to actually seal it all up in the back. I don't really need it that well sealed since mine is under cover behind a pool house bar, but if you have that kind of mount and yours is in the open you might want to keep looking. If your mount lets you somehow determine the width of the vertical bars you could probably align them with the splits in the back cover, but mine are fixed to a 200mm vesa gap and that doesn't align.
customer_reviews.author: DIY Guy

customer_reviews.title: It's a great material. But way too big.
customer_reviews.text: I own a 50" TV. Either this is my fault for not reading the sizes properly or they just run really big. I bought the size 50" and man, is this thing BIG! I literally have like 8-10 inches of spare space across my TV. The product is excellent, I will not discredit them for my own mistake. But please, follow their size guide.
customer_reviews.author: Crowned Susanoo

customer_reviews.title: great coverage good material my two televisions are outside in ...
customer_reviews.text: great coverage good material my two televisions are outside in my outdoor kitchen area and with the recent rain I was afraid they might get wet, but not the case they are well protected and stayed good with the covers I purchased,
customer_reviews.author: Renee

customer_reviews.title: Built to Last Several Winters
customer_reviews.text: This cover is very well made. I just needed it to cover my tv overnight when not using but this product is made of materials that are built to cover the TV during the winter months up north. It's strong enough that I believe it should last for many years. Lots of velcro openings so you can use it for any tv stand and allow the wires to still stay connected while covering the unit. It's a must have for long time storage for your tv.
customer_reviews.author: notap

customer_reviews.title: Perfect fit and works as described!
customer_reviews.text: Fits perfectly on my 55". Good quality velcro holds it together nicely and I like the pocket on the back for the remote. While not in direct rain, this is covering a TV on a dock that gets a ton of run off rain, salt water air and moisture. I also have two 40" covers that have been in use for over two years now that are still going strong. Couldn't be happier with this product!
customer_reviews.author: Taylormade

customer_reviews.title: Just the right solution for my need/requirement - and budget
customer_reviews.text: I wanted a TV cover to protect my new 40" TV installed on a covered and screened patio and yet with Florida rain, it needed more protection than a roof and screen to keep out the elements. Rather than a ridged box type covering, the cover protects and yet when not in use the TV can stand on its own without an ugly frame surrounding it. I might add not only does it perform on protection, the price was right too.
customer_reviews.author: Dr. Bob

customer_reviews.title: Great quality however
customer_reviews.text: Great quality however, it's difficult to install because I don't have an arm mount outside, but rather just a fixed mount. I'm probably going to order a new mount which will make this work much better for me. I didn't notice anywhere in the description that it works best with arm mounts although I probably would have still ordered it. Again, the quality of the cover is great.
customer_reviews.author: James Kendig

customer_reviews.title: Keeping the TV dry.
customer_reviews.text: This is the second time I bought this brand of TV cover. I upgraded to a larger TV so naturally I needed the bigger cover. This cover has lots of room to get behind the TV and really button it up. It's also large enough that I can keep my Cable box hooked up to the TV and simply wrap everything up. It has shrunk a bit from rain will see if that trend continues as time goes on.
customer_reviews.author: Thomas A.

customer_reviews.title: Not a great buy if you are looking for something gentle for your TV
customer_reviews.text: I think this item is too heavy. There is a high risk of scratching your TV if you plan to add and remove this cover every day. The microfiber is soo rough that it looks like pick up truck cover. This cover is not at all gentle to your TV. More than all, I found DUST on the TV Screen even when I kept the TV covered for more than 36 hours.
customer_reviews.author: Stavan

customer_reviews.title: Great figment and good initial quality
customer_reviews.text: Just received this cover today and threw it on by myself without issue. As I just received it, I can not comment on it’s sturdiness against the elements but I will say that it has a liner on the inside and is respectably built. Just as important is the fit, I have a 60” Samsung tv that measures 54” wide x 34” high and following the advice Of other purchasers, ordered my cover based on dimensions and not screen size. The cover fit like a glove and I couldn’t be happier with the look of it.
customer_reviews.author: Catherine law

customer_reviews.title: Very Pleased with a Few Reminders
customer_reviews.text: I have an outdoor tv for my yard and must say I am very pleased with the quality and coverage this product provides. But since this is not a custom fit (and it doesn't promise to be) you need to be very intentional in sealing up the tv and wires. And that is where I had some small issue. Water will find its way into places you will wish it wouldn't....so, cover up and check you seals and you will be good to go.
customer_reviews.author: Aurexia

customer_reviews.title: Great Product
customer_reviews.text: Great product, study, well built, faxt return. Make sure you measure per the reviews and not dimensionally as TV are normally measured. Would buy again. Kinda awkward to install with the TV up in the air and using a ladder, but eventually fits.Can't rate it being waterproof as nothing is. It does protect the TV overall. NOTE: This is not compatible with the Electric motorized TV stand mount. Does not completely cover the TV in the back for a fit and firm fitting..
customer_reviews.author: Gary D.

customer_reviews.title: Great coverage in wind and rain.
customer_reviews.text: This fits perfect. Just loose enough to fit easily. Has been through a couple of rain storms. While it does sit under the corner of a gazebo, it’s still mostly exposed on the sides. One thing is the remote pocket is quite deep for most remotes. It makes it difficult to reach down and grab small ones. I may stuff some paper towels in the bottom to have the remotes sit up higher. Not enough of a problem to rate this lower.
customer_reviews.author: N.Gibbs

customer_reviews.title: Decent protection against rain.
customer_reviews.text: The cover stays on and protects from rain and snow. Our tv is ceiling-mounted in our screened-in porch in Northern VA. Our supposedly temperate zone has seen some high winds, rain, and flurries since we got the cover a couple of weeks ago. So far the cover is doing the job. Knew it wouldn’t be much protection against cold temps, as the material is not thick.
customer_reviews.author: D. Jenkins

customer_reviews.title: So Far So Good
customer_reviews.text: I'm still in the process of trying out this cover on my outdoor TV. It was easy to install and if you follow the chart on the ordering pages the fit will be perfect or slightly perfect. Mine turned out to have a bit of extra room on the bottom but overall it seems well made. Time will tell if it keeps moisture out of my TV although I don't expect any since my TV is under a patio roof. Overall I'm satisfied with this purchase so far and the price I paid is more than reasonable.
customer_reviews.author: E. Yanez

customer_reviews.title: Survived hail storm!
customer_reviews.text: We’ve only had this cover on our outdoor tv a couple weeks BUT yesterday we had an unexpected severe thunderstorm with about 5 inches of rain and 10 minutes of hail! Our TV is not under a patio roof or other shelter (just mounted to the side of our house). I was shocked to discover that the TV still worked the next day. I thought for sure the storm would have ruined it. 5 stars for keeping our TV safe during a severe storm!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great product for great price
customer_reviews.text: Great TV cover! The quality was much better than expected, covers my TV nicely as well as the sound bar I have mounted below. My TV is exposed to the elements and it survived the first rain storm. We will see how the Arizona sun treats it in the long term, but the price is so great it is not a big deal to order another one. Would be better if the velcro on the bottom had straps vs. sewn along the seam. Overall good buy
customer_reviews.author: meghan

customer_reviews.title: ... has some unique design features that make it more useful (remote pocket
customer_reviews.text: The cover is made from a high quality material that has some unique design features that make it more useful (remote pocket; velcro closure on bottom seem). The price for this cover is also very reasonable compared to other outdoor covers. I have my 40" LED covered that is outside and it fits very nicely. I highly recommend the product if you are in the market for protection against the elements.
customer_reviews.author: Randy Ebersberger

customer_reviews.title: Working fine for a few months now
customer_reviews.text: Seems to be doing the job well in rain, heat and cold. Water beading on it still. Do look at the dimensions specifically, and not just your TV size. Measure the TV. I got one size smaller than would be recommended, which had a more tailored fit on the sides, and keeps it from bagging on the sides. A little long on the bottom, but the Velcro seals tight.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Very good quality.
customer_reviews.text: I am really impressed with this TV cover. It is a very good quality fabric and the design will conform to a variety of mounting applications. It even has a pouch for keeping the remote with the TV. This was a purchase that after receiving it, I believe I actually got more than I paid for. I will buy this product again for future needs.
customer_reviews.author: Bensaplayin

customer_reviews.title: 1st try, defective item; 2nd try 5/5
customer_reviews.text: Update 5* received a new cover quickly through Amazon. Cover is sturdy, no holes this time, and has held up in the rain already. Highly recommend 1* review Felt sturdy, but there was a 10” gap where it looks like it wasn’t sewed properly. Requested an exchange through amazon, will see how the next one is. Otherwise felt sturdy
customer_reviews.author: Derek Yang

customer_reviews.title: Protects tv
customer_reviews.text: This cover is very bulky and does not fit snugly around the mount so I’m not sure if it is indeed weatherproof. It really should be thinner and tighter for today’s thin lcd TVs. The remote control pocket in the back it very convenient and the free micro fiber cloth for cleaning works well. For the money it doesn’t seem like a bad cover but we’ll see how it holds up this summer.
customer_reviews.author: Matthew and Noelle Drake

customer_reviews.title: It covers everything including the wiring in the back.
customer_reviews.text: Hi! I just received this a couple days ago. I had selected this one over the others because of the back. I have a 24" monitor on a stand. This covers the monitor, the sound bar on top of the monitor and the wiring in the back with room to spare. I can't speak on the effectiveness during weather but it's under an awning so it should be fine.
customer_reviews.author: Bender is Great

customer_reviews.title: Perfect For Outside
customer_reviews.text: We purchases this TV cover along with a TV stand to put an outdoor TV on our patio. The cover is perfect. It's very good quality, slips right on the TV and Velcro's all the way across the bottom. I have no doubt that it will keep rain or dust out. Also it's very nice to have the remote control pocket so that you don't have to worry about that getting lost. I would definitely recommend this product to anyone looking for a TV cover for outside or in the garage.
customer_reviews.author: terip

customer_reviews.title: Really keeps it dry!
customer_reviews.text: A very nice TV cover. Thick material. Wasn't sure how well it would keep the TV dry until we got hit by a surprise downpour the other day. Usually I'd take the TV in if there was sustained heavy rain in the forecast. Figured I'd have to let the TV dry out for a few days before using, but much to my surprise, it was dry as a bone, even after a torrential downpour with high winds. Was so confident after that, that I left it out in the cover again last night when it rained the whole night. Again, perfectly dry. Completely satisfied!
customer_reviews.author: AllHVAC

customer_reviews.title: Fantastic Quality TV Cover
customer_reviews.text: Wow wow wow! This cover is awesome! It is made from the same fabric as my several hundred dollar boat cover. I did not expect that. So it should last for years to come. I also appreciate the Velcro closures as this will allow me to seal the TV and wires up tight against any weather. They thought of everything and made this thing right the first time. Bring on the storms. Not worried anymore about ruining my outdoor TV.
customer_reviews.author: AP Chef

customer_reviews.title: The velcro feature - to secure the tv - fast.
customer_reviews.text: The outdoor tv cover fits over my tv - thats installed in our Gazebo. The fair priced cover will protect my tv from the environment, The best feature - I like is the velcro - this feature makes it easy & fast to secure my outdoor tv. I had the tv cover installed in less than 2 minutes. Happy Dude...
customer_reviews.author: Dante Cruz

customer_reviews.title: Thumbs Up for Outdoor TV Cover
customer_reviews.text: The outdoor TV cover arrived in a timely manner and well packaged. Fit perfectly over my 55" Samsung TV, once I figured out the front of it. Would definitely recommend this cover.
customer_reviews.author: Jeff Van Gastel

customer_reviews.title: I intentionally bought the 55" for my outdoor 42" TV ...
customer_reviews.text: I intentionally bought the 55" for my outdoor 42" TV, knowing that it would be a little too big. However, this cover was the only one that I could find that was at least 35" in height so I could properly cover my components (cable box and soundbar) installed directly underneath the TV on a mantel. This cover works nearly perfectly so far and covers all of my gear and fits fairly snug because of the straps.
customer_reviews.author: Wade Wilson

customer_reviews.title: Outdoor TV Cover
customer_reviews.text: Glad I purchased the 44-46 rather than the 46-48 cover for my 46" Samsung. Fits very nice, easy to put on. The only problem I have is the rear flap does not close and allow a ceiling or wall mount to be covered. You must cut a slit in the flap and cut a hole (I have a ceiling mount) for the pole in order to close the flap. This should have been done at the factory. Otherwise I like it.
customer_reviews.author: manchuvet

customer_reviews.title: A Great Protector!!!
customer_reviews.text: We have a TV on our patio and I bought this mainly for dust and sun protection, but we just had a crazy rain storm for 4 straight days and I was worried about the TV, but I went outside today and it worked fine. The only negative thing is that I was a little worried about the remote pocket and when I tested everything today that part did have a pool of water in it. I dried the remote and replaced the batteries and it works fine- but I think we'll store the remote in the house moving forward. Overall this a really great product for the price!!
customer_reviews.author: CoriBail

customer_reviews.title: Exactly as described, excellent product!
customer_reviews.text: The 36"-38" fit my 40" SAMSUNG 4K TV just right with the square mounting hardware installed. A little extra room all around but that just made it easier to slide on and take out. It's very well made with high quality fabric and the special material inside safely protects the screen. Glad I bought it! And I ordered a second one for my other 40" TV.
customer_reviews.author: ST

customer_reviews.title: Doesnt Work With Pole Mounts
customer_reviews.text: I didn't listen to the reviews. This thing is seriously huge. Buy a size down at least. I have a pole mount and it is not designed for that. No way at all to deal the back. I ended up cutting it and adding velcro to make it work even though they said it would work with rear pole mounts.
customer_reviews.author: Southern Spoon

customer_reviews.title: TV Cover
customer_reviews.text: This product is amazing! We use it to cover a TV that's outside. We used to have a patio that leaked, and when it rained last, the TV was under a leaking part of the patio. Although I moved it, it still got wet. Well, the same TV (with this cover) has now been mounted on a wall and looks and works fabulously. I would definitely recommend this product to anyone!
customer_reviews.author: Monica P. Kelley

customer_reviews.title: Broke my tv. Don’t buy
customer_reviews.text: First of all I would give 0 stars if I could. It ruined my TV. I used it on a semi covered porch. It rained, hardly a hurricane or anything. I took the cover off, the TV doesn’t work anymore. Don’t make the same mistake I did. Don’t buy this item. I had the tv cover on totally correct and it didn’t work.
customer_reviews.author: Rick C.

customer_reviews.title: Horrible. They didn't sew the seam and there are ...
customer_reviews.text: Horrible. They didn't sew the seam and there are tiny holes all over it, like when you sew something and take the sewing out type of tiny holes. We are returning and going with a different brand. It is in no way all weather safe.
customer_reviews.author: Justabuyer

customer_reviews.title: Blocks the weather, but not bugs
customer_reviews.text: Fits a 42" TV fine, even seems a little bigger. Holds on pretty good and covers the screen. Material seems pretty thick and good quality. The back flap has to stay open due to the wall mount which allows insects to build nests inside the cover. The bottom flap is also not the most user friendly since it velcros on the inside and not the outside.
customer_reviews.author: Jacob

customer_reviews.title: Must have for outdoor TVs
customer_reviews.text: The pocket in the back for the TV remote is really convenient. As is the velcro that runs in the back, so it allows for the cover to easily go around the TV mount bracket. It's really come in handy, protecting the TV from collecting ashes from the current surrounding wildfires. Comfortably fits our 55" TV. I highly recommend.
customer_reviews.author: Janet

customer_reviews.title: Our neighbor recommended this cover - they leave their tv outside year-around ...
customer_reviews.text: We live in the Midwest. We have a tv on our covered porch that in past years we would take down and store in the house for the winter. Our neighbor recommended this cover - they leave their tv outside year-around covered with this outdoor tv cover. I like the construction of this product and the ease of use - much easier than taking our tv down. I give it 4 stars because we haven't gone through a winter yet to see how our tv survives!
customer_reviews.author: MamaT

customer_reviews.title: Buyer beware!!! DO NOT PURCHASE!!!!
customer_reviews.text: Buyer beware!!! This product will damage your TV screen. It is stated in the description this TV cover "has soft fabric that will not scratch your TV and will help you protect TV's or monitor's display" which is not true. You can see the inside of the product in my photo. It's a vinyl coating inside that will damage your TV's screen as seen in my other photo. The TV cover left abrasive marks on 2 of my Samsung TV's that will not come off. On top of that I've sent a message to the seller Click Depot back on 8/13 with photos and they still have not responded to the problem.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Not what is advertised
customer_reviews.text: The advertisement shows and says the cover opens from the front. It doesn't. I either have to get a ladder out to to take the entire cover off and on to watch TV . this puts a lot of stress on your bracket. & TV. Bought a different brand that opens from the front because the size I needed was out of stock.
customer_reviews.author: Seneca

customer_reviews.title: Perfect Fit
customer_reviews.text: I order this cover for a 65" LG TV that was installed on my patio and it was a perfect fit! After reading the reviews, I based the size from the actual dimensions of the screen and not the actual TV. Hopefully, the cover will protect the TV from inclement weather.
customer_reviews.author: Tricia

customer_reviews.title: Very good product
customer_reviews.text: I have a 40" LG tv out on my covered but not enclosed patio. This cover fits with room to spare. I like that it has an enclosed pocket for the remotes so they stay dry and I know where they're at. Very easy to put on and take off. Looks to be made of good durable material. Very happy with it.
customer_reviews.author: Gerry

customer_reviews.title: Great Product
customer_reviews.text: We received the cover promptly . Cover fits perfectly and easily slides over TV. Nice lightweight material and quality material. TV is outside in a screened room. We are hoping it will withstand the outdoor conditions. Thank you!!!
customer_reviews.author: jan

customer_reviews.title: Good Quality
customer_reviews.text: Works great. I have a 50" TV outside on the patio and although this cover is a bit baggy for it (the cover fits up to 52" which is why its baggy), it gets the job done well. It has quite a bit of velcro on the edges that are adjustable which is nice to shape things like you want around the TV. Fits nicely around my TV mount arm.
customer_reviews.author: D. Wahl

customer_reviews.title: Great cover!
customer_reviews.text: This cover is awesome! Fits well and even holds the remotes, which is really nice. We just received it and started using it so that's the only reason for four stars versus five. If it holds up like we think it will I will come back and rain five stars down on this fine product.
customer_reviews.author: Vikki M.

customer_reviews.title: Good Buy
customer_reviews.text: This has been a great way to keep the dust and other weather elements off the outdoor television. Small pocket for the remote is nice to have. Can be a little tricky to get on and off (by yourself), but once you get the hang of it, no problem.
customer_reviews.author: Just Me

customer_reviews.title: Order smaller if your tv screen is 1 inch thick or less
customer_reviews.text: I ordered the 52-55”. My tv is 55”. The tv thickness is less than an inch. This cover was way too big. It works great but hangs 4” Lower than the TV. Will keep but next time will order much smaller because the company does not use your TV screen size
customer_reviews.author: BRYCE

customer_reviews.title: Great Buy
customer_reviews.text: We use this in our garage. It's great. Durable. And Easy to put on. I will say if our tv was any higher it would be hard for me to do by myself (Thats only due to my height not the product) The pocket for the remote is awesome too. Never have to look for it
customer_reviews.author: Southern Belle

customer_reviews.title: Excellent outdoor cover
customer_reviews.text: This is a well made outdoor TV cover. It has several 'opening's' in the back that are all Velcro lined which allow you to choose a specific opening for your type of TV mount. It is made of heavy gauge laminated canvas for long life durability. One feature I'm extremely please with is the 'TV Remote/Accessories' pocket. This allows you to stash the remote and/or cables for the TV on the cover so they can be easily located the next time. Well done. In fact, I will be a return customer because this represents a far better cover than I have for another TV outside
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: FADES QUICK, TERRIBLE PRODUCT, no customer service
customer_reviews.text: Faded so quickly after purchase and it is in the shade. Very cheap material to protect an expensive tv. They should have protection from the sun on it.
customer_reviews.author: mike

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for my 55" Samsung
customer_reviews.text: It too a total of two minutes to put this in my 55" Samsung. I am using a double mount (not a single arm mount) and it worked perfectly. Lay the cover face down; open the big flap; slide it over the top of the TV; snug the bottom and close the Velcro. Perfect.
customer_reviews.author: Daniel M. Ribar

customer_reviews.title: Did not fit my 55 in TV despite what q&a says
customer_reviews.text: My 55 in TV has a width of 49 inches and falls in the gap of the two sizes. Despite what vendor says in q&a section of recommending the smaller size it did not fit my TV and needed to return for larger size. Product files seem to good quality though.
customer_reviews.author: Erin Taylor

customer_reviews.title: Great Product!
customer_reviews.text: Love this product. My TV is on my uncovered patio and this cover has protected it from 3-4 major thunderstorms. Not recommended by manufacturer to do this, but it has done its job and TV works wonderfully. Great product!
customer_reviews.author: Debra Michelle Harris

customer_reviews.title: Does what it's supposed to do
customer_reviews.text: Works good for keeping the tv covered. It's a little tricky getting in on the tv and doesn't fit too snug but it does the job. It sort of sags some but it does cover the tv, so that's what I bought it for. I guess if it fit snug it would be impossible to get on the tv. Good product overall.
customer_reviews.author: Terry S

customer_reviews.title: Should have bought this sooner.
customer_reviews.text: Fits the 40-in LG on my porch perfectly, The design accommodates the mounting bracket and TV with very, very minimal exterior exposure to the elements. Should have bought this sooner. Had plastic wrapped around the TV for the past 3 years, all worked fine untill I turned it on, on a humid day, Smoked the TV, as I said shoud have bought this sooner.
customer_reviews.author: GWL

customer_reviews.title: Perfect Outdoor TV Cover for Me
customer_reviews.text: Got this cover after looking at all the ones that are offered. Couldn’t be more pleased with it. I have an “indoor” tv, outside near the hottub, and this thing is exactly what I needed. The velcro fastens tightly. The fit is perfect (I measured the tv about 10 times before I ordered the cover). The remote control pocket is handy. Highly recommend this product.
customer_reviews.author: N8

customer_reviews.title: Great Fit and Quality
customer_reviews.text: Was very pleased with the quality of this product. It fit perfectly on my 55" outdoor TV. I really like that the bottom can also be weatherized with the velcro seam. The remote holder on the back is an added value. Highly recommended!
customer_reviews.author: Ruralroute2

customer_reviews.title: Just what I needed
customer_reviews.text: I bought the 50" - 52" cover and it fits my Samsung 55" TV very well. It is easy to put on and seals nicely with a ceiling mount on the back porch. Here in the south dirt daubers are a problem so I hope this keeps them out. Very pleased so far and the quality is such that it will probably last for many years. If you need a cover, this is the one to get.
customer_reviews.author: Mike

customer_reviews.title: Inaccurate sizing
customer_reviews.text: Like many review have stated the sizing is way off. I have a 32" TV and ordered the 24-26" size first. It was a little to small. Not quite wide enough for my TV to fit in so I returned it and decided to go with the 30-32". Te TV swam in it. There was no way I could use it. The product itself looked to be of good quality but they definitely have issues with their sizing. If it would have fit I would have kept it but ended up returning both sizes.
customer_reviews.author: Matthew Vaske

customer_reviews.title: It works
customer_reviews.text: It fits and works, but the interior isn't any kind of soft fabric, it is just plastic. Not sure if it will scratch the screen or not. "HAS SOFT INTERIOR FABRIC that will not scratch your TV and will help you protect TV's or monitor's display", this is from the item description. The interior plastic isn't soft, it is just slick.
customer_reviews.author: Rick L. Holcomb

customer_reviews.title: Heavy fabric.  Well built
customer_reviews.text: Heavy material. Easy on/off. Handy pocket for 2 or 3 remotes.
customer_reviews.author: Bill Andersen

customer_reviews.title: Great Outdoor TV Cover
customer_reviews.text: We used this for our outdoor tv. We have had quite a few mild to moderate rains lately and this has kept the tv dry. If there was a major storm with wind we will still take the TV inside as there are a few small gaps in the back of the over where the TV attaches to the ceiling mount pole.
customer_reviews.author: S Paterson

customer_reviews.title: This is a very good product. The only thing we have a problems ...
customer_reviews.text: This is a very good product. The only thing we have a problems with is the way it comes together in the back. The hook and loop is on the wrong side for us and our bracket. We haven't figured out how to make it work correctly but we are still trying. Other than that it is awesome.
customer_reviews.author: Charlene Walls

customer_reviews.title: Meets all of the Requirements
customer_reviews.text: The cover meets all of the statements made in the description. BE SURE TO MEASURE the height and width of your TV and USE the sizing chart provided. The cover for my TV was smaller than the diagonal dimension would indicate.
customer_reviews.author: Greg MS

customer_reviews.title: Excellent protective cover
customer_reviews.text: The bottom flap, when allowed to hang down covers my cable box so no water will get into it - used this cover to protect a wall mounted 55" TV out on our screened in lanai - it works excellent
customer_reviews.author: A.J. Coach

customer_reviews.title: Good cover for my outdoor TV
customer_reviews.text: I bought this for my new outdoor TV. It is easy to put on and seems to work well. My TV is mounted in a very secure spot (no direct sub, no exposure to rain) so it's really only functioning the keep the screen clean and I can't comment on how well it would hold up to more sever conditions.
customer_reviews.author: Matthew Bourbeau

customer_reviews.title: What more could you ask for!?
customer_reviews.text: Like other reviews state - do not go by the size of your screen but actually measure the dimensions. It’s a nice snug fit. Here in Texas we have had major storms over the past month and the cover has done its job perfectly!! Great little buy
customer_reviews.author: Pkp4life

customer_reviews.title: Worth the money.
customer_reviews.text: Love the quality of this cover, the size runs big. I purchased the 50-52 inch cover for a 49" tv. I should have gone one size down. I did not review the remote control because this tv is mounted on my back porch and I keep the remote inside do to living on salt water.
customer_reviews.author: tim152

customer_reviews.title: A Nice TV Cover
customer_reviews.text: I just installed this so my review isn't based on having it on for a long time. With that said, the cover appears to be of a very good quality and fits my new Vizio 40" TV well. So far, I would recommend this cover to anyone looking to buy one. We'll see how well it holds up in the long run but I'm not expecting any problems or issues.
customer_reviews.author: Anthony O'Hagan

customer_reviews.title: Nice cover.  Like the remote pocket.
customer_reviews.text: Seems like a really nice cover but, it is sometimes hard to get the right one due to tv size and possibly color not working. They charge you shipping to return. Dumb. I ordered another one different size different color.
customer_reviews.author: Nancy McDonald

customer_reviews.title: Maybe order a size smaller
customer_reviews.text: Wow, the cover is enormous. It was so saggy, I thought I bought the wrong size cover. I was trying to fold it in some but the more I did the worse it looked. It had to be a labeling error at the company. Anyway, returning it.
customer_reviews.author: Bungalow Bill

customer_reviews.title: It works
customer_reviews.text: We have used this cover on our flatscreen that’s outside and it kept our tv insulated through winter, dry in the spring and summer and in perfect working condition for us to enjoy it now.
customer_reviews.author: MrsDiMatteo

customer_reviews.title: Nice tv cover
customer_reviews.text: So far so good. It's covering our tv on our screened patio. Since we live in AZ we don't worry too much about the rain but it occasionally comes in the screened patio on the opposite side of the tv. It's great keeping the AZ dust from the tv. Love it completely protects.
customer_reviews.author: Pat

customer_reviews.title: Excellent product...Excellent quality!
customer_reviews.text: The Outdoor TV cover is excellent! It is very high quality and fits like a glove. I highly recommend this TV cover. It protects the screen and components from dust, pollen and other debris. It is an essential product, a necessity to protect my TV from the elements.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Stitching coming apart after 2 weeks
customer_reviews.text: Like the idea of the cover but the stitching is already coming apart. I’m pretty sure we’ve had this up for 1.5 weeks—- maybe 2 and we’ve only used the tv about 4 times. Will have to return sadly which means we can’t use our tv until we get a new one. Annoyed!!
customer_reviews.author: Louis

customer_reviews.title: Does the job but a little big
customer_reviews.text: Bought this for my 55" TV that I have outside. Works fine and plenty of velcro on the back for different kinds of mounts. My only complaint is it is kind of big and does take a little bit to put on and get all the velcro fastened.
customer_reviews.author: Ryan

customer_reviews.title: Best Outdoor TV Cover
customer_reviews.text: This is awesome! I live in Texas and we have crazy pollen weather at times that will turn everything green. After I mounted my tv outside under my patio I thought it would be nice to have a cover to help my tv withstand the weather. The first order I received the cover was to large, the company was nice enough to refund me my money and I ordered the correct size. The fit is perfect. Easy to take off and put back on with the Velcro installed
customer_reviews.author: Megan

customer_reviews.title: Good screen cover to protect your investment
customer_reviews.text: A bit pricey but very satisfied with the cover craftsmanship very well material used is very durable easy to cover flat screen panel everything is Velcro even comes with a Remote Control pouch. Also comes with a screen cleaning cloth
customer_reviews.author: Joe Colagreco

customer_reviews.title: That is cost effective and easy to use and  important protects your tv from rain,damp nights, temps vary 39 pm 100 or more daily
customer_reviews.text: Super easy to use...easy to put on and love the fact that you can just use the Velcro seams to deal IT up nice and tight for a cool camp evening. The pocket for your remote is a super idea. Would recommend to anyone that has an out door room .
customer_reviews.author: MARSOC MOM

customer_reviews.title: What a great idea
customer_reviews.text: I had my choice, I could either buy a 40 inch TV from Walmart for 200 bucks, or a specially made TV for outdoors the same size for $1500. I figured I would buy the cheaper one and make a cover out of something waterproof, That would probably look cheap as crap. Then I found out these people make one that looks professional and does a great job of protecting my TV from the elements and for 25 bucks, what a deal
customer_reviews.author: av8or61u

customer_reviews.title: Perfect cover for my patio 55 in tv
customer_reviews.text: I put up a 55 inch Sony TV and this cover is thick and solid. The remote holder is nice so the remotes are protected. The wall mount I have is a dull arm and this works great
customer_reviews.author: Chadladage

customer_reviews.title: EXCELLENT quality for the price
customer_reviews.text: EXCELLENT quality for the price. Only recommendation would be to go by the demensions. I purchased one for my 50 inch vizio and sent it back for size 48 because it and was huge. Sending it back was breeze. No hastle at all. Totally worth bc this cover is as good as it gets!
customer_reviews.author: ColtonsMommy

customer_reviews.title: Velcro Seal on Bottom to open
customer_reviews.text: Over all it fit my Insignia 43 inch perfectly, only thing is at the bottom where you seal the Velcro well it is too lose and remain semi open. At the back where the hole is for the mount it also remains semi open and if it were to rain/wind/dust etc.. would be exposed to the elements. Over all i would not leave my TV outside with this cover i don't trust it enough. Will submitting for a refund.
customer_reviews.author: Hpar2010

customer_reviews.title: Great Quality but....
customer_reviews.text: This cover is excellent quality and certainly protects the TV from weather elements. The only issue I have with the cover is that it is very hard to get on the TV due to the flaps on the back that have Velcro on all sides. They stick to one another making it difficult to place the cover over the TV. I have modified the back by rolling up the back flaps and securing with safety pins. The cover still encloses the TV sufficiently.
customer_reviews.author: Maria

customer_reviews.title: Read instructions for sizing
customer_reviews.text: I read the instructions for how to find the correct size. That worked great, fit is spot on. Our tv is mounted high so it can be difficult to be on the step ladder and get the cover on. Easier with 2 people. But quality of cover is great. We’ve had a lot of rain plus hot, dusty days and it’s well protected.
customer_reviews.author: Breanna Sharp

customer_reviews.title: Love this! I shouldn’t have ordered one bigger than ...
customer_reviews.text: Love this! I shouldn’t have ordered one bigger than my flat, but I wasn’t sure if it was one of those that came a lot smaller than what was said. Well, this is a GREAT investment in keeping your TV clean from limited use or from a move. I would totally get this again, and my family as already asked about this.
customer_reviews.author: 143Foodies

customer_reviews.title: Very good quality.
customer_reviews.text: This cover is a perfect for our newly installed patio TV. The material is strong but soft on the inside and is a perfect for our 50" TV. The pouch on the back side of the cover stores the remote. I would definitely recommend this cover.
customer_reviews.author: Linda G. Ball

customer_reviews.title: Great to cover
customer_reviews.text: Great cover. It's made of thick material and doesn't feel flimsy at all. There's a pocket in the back for a remote control. The Velcro is strong and holds tight. Feels very durable. I got the 46-48" cover and fits over my 55" TV perfectly. Highly recommend this cover.
customer_reviews.author: Rosie

customer_reviews.title: Keeps water out
customer_reviews.text: Used this product to cover out outdoor 48" tv. works excellent for keeping the water out, also has a pocket on the back for remote storage, super handy
customer_reviews.author: Tracy Pannell

customer_reviews.title: Good Quality Product
customer_reviews.text: The cover is made of a thick durable material and has Velcro to adjust the fit. I'm using the cover to keep desert sand from getting into my outdoor tv.
customer_reviews.author: Rene Collard

customer_reviews.title: Great cover!
customer_reviews.text: Great quality! Just what we needed! Fit was good, easy to take on and off. We have it by our pool area and great knowing TV is protected when not in use.
customer_reviews.author: HeatherZ

customer_reviews.title: Great fit along the back
customer_reviews.text: purchased for 55", fit perfectly, seems high quality, and most importantly the seams in the back fit my TV bracket, reducing the exposure to elements. also the bottom is protected well.
customer_reviews.author: Gabec2000

customer_reviews.title: Most Effecient
customer_reviews.text: We keep our TV outside and cover it every night. It is on a stand and the cover slips right over the top of the TV. It is very durable. I would buy this product again and would recommend it to family and friends.
customer_reviews.author: Lorraine K

customer_reviews.title: Fits perfect on my 50 inch screen.
customer_reviews.text: I originally bought the 50" cover and it was just too big for my 50" Sony Tv. This thing fits great. I set up my dish receiver behind my tv along with a surge protector and it fits great over everything. There is even enough room at the bottom to close a protect my TV from all the rain, dust, and wind that may hit it.
customer_reviews.author: TrueHonestReviews

customer_reviews.title: Nice cover for outdoors
customer_reviews.text: I’ve had this installed for about a few months now and it’s worked perfectly. The only minor problem is the way it covers the TV mount area, I think it could be a little bit better - it really could use a separate flap of some sort to help just a little bit more. But it still works great
customer_reviews.author: damage31

customer_reviews.title: Great cover for the price in initial quality
customer_reviews.text: Really feels like a more expensive cover in heft and function. We’ll see how longevity goes. I’m rarely able to revisit these reviews 6 months or a year later to update them and this is one of those buyer beware’s that UV stability is usually the achilles heel of outdoor covers...
customer_reviews.author: Not Assigned

customer_reviews.title: I love this cover
customer_reviews.text: I needed a cover for my TV on my patio. I love this cover, it was easy to put on, and it even has its own space for the remote control. Which makes things a lot easier! I'm very satisfied with the product.
customer_reviews.author: Harlie R.

product_meta.title: Outdoor TV Cover 52" - 55" - with Bottom Cover - The Best Black Quality Weatherproof and Dust-Proof Material with Microfiber Cloth. Protect Your TV Now! Patent Pending
product_meta.description:
Size:52" - 55"

 OUTDOOR TV COVER by CLICKS 

 Ever experienced having wet or dusty TV or Monitors on your deck, patio, or poolside? Are you worried to take it outdoor due to fear of raindrops, dust, sun or snow?

 Fear No More! Clicks Outdoor TV Cover is finally here to the rescue! 

 Why Choose the Outdoor TV Cover by Clicks? 
- Made with high-quality and premium material that protects your television from different weather conditions like rain, extreme heat from the sun, dust, dew, mist and other contributing factors that can cause damage 
- Has Soft Fabric that will prevents scratches on your TV screens when it is not use. Now you don't have to worry about the quality of images or films shown into your display because our TV cover is proved to protect against water, sun and mildew damage 
- Double Stitched Edges to ensure maximum strength. You are ensured that your TV is 100% protected by our built-to-last TV cover with Velcro Straps 
- Elegant-looking design that is perfect for outdoor locations such as restaurants, hotels, marinas or poolside locations 

 What's in it for you? 
Our TV Cover measures 55 x 35 x 5 inches which ensures that your Television is Covered. The openings of our cover has Velcro straps installed, making it durable and built to last for a longer period of time, compared to ones made with zippers. It also has a small pouch for your remote control. It is dust-proof, waterproof, and weatherproof, so you wouldn't have to worry about your TV's condition once our TV cover is in use. 

 ENJOY OUTDOOR ENTERTAINMENT AT ITS FINEST! 

 It is backed by a 3 YEARS warranty BUT we can’t guarantee that the price will stay the same, so click now and grab your pair while the price is still low!

 Click "ADD TO CART" to purchase this product while supplies last!
feature_bullets: DUST-PROOF, WATERPROOF, WEATHERPROOF OUTDOOR TV Covers that provides year-round protection for your Television. It comes with a microfiber cloth to help you clean, dust and polish without using use of any cleaning chemicals.
100% COVERED. Double Stitched for maximum strength, provides the best protection for your outdoor television. Openings are with Velcro straps that are very durable compared to zippers.

FITS FLAT SCREEN TV's AND DISPLAYS - Measuring 55 x 35 x 5 inches, it is compatible with double wall mounts and single walls mount. Our TV Cover is designed with features to speed installation, which also has a cover for your remote control
HAS SOFT FABRIC that will not scratch your TV and will help you protect TV's or monitor's display
GUARANTEED TO LAST - With 3 MONTHS NO-QUESTIONS-ASKED REPLACEMENT GUARANTEE, you are ensured with satisfaction, including the best customer support anybody could ask for.
